cast.name: 妮丽娜·祖碧尔 Nirina Zubir

introduction: Hendri and Marini are successful in business. However, they don`t pay enough attention to their children, Resika and Karin. Due to the economic crisis, their business suffers. Hendri turns into a gloomy person and enters a misleading path. Marini accidentally catches Hendri outside the house going towards a large tree in the corner of a vacant lot, where Hendri is secretly looking for shortcuts to regain his wealth - by allying with the devil. Their business soon recovers but then, Resika realises that something strange is happening to her sister, Karin.
